entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: ISimdVector<TSelf, T>.GetMatchCount() and .IndexOfFirstMatch() #94639

Closed

  • Xamarin MAUI iOS using .NET 7 & 8 and OData client throwing Attempting to JIT compile method '(wrapper dynamic-method) #94594

PullRequests

Created

  • UInt128: Throw DivideByZeroException when divisor is 0 #94640
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Provide System.ServiceModel.Syndication package readme #94638
    area-System.ServiceModel.Syndication, community-contribution
  • JIT: Document why the EH successor set is seemingly too large #94634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Improve forwardsub for small types #94631
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • FabricBot: Remove project board automation #94626
    area-Meta
  • Add feature switch attribute design doc #94625
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Fixes the build when IlcStandaloneGCSupport is specified #94624
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Use post order computed by SSA in VN #94623
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Document DateOnly.AddDays exception #94635
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Provide System.Text.Encodings.Web package readme #94637
    area-System.Text.Encodings.Web, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update alpine arm32 in release 8.0 CI #94609
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • FabricBot: Remove libraries area pod project board automation #94622
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Add support for ISpanFormattable in StringBuilder.Append(Object) #92197
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • JIT: Improve local assertion prop throughput #94597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce VectorXXX.CountMatches and VectorXXX.IndexOfMatch helper methods to ensure optimal codegen for ARM64 and unrolled fallback paths #94472
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, help wanted, 9.0.0
  • Introduce fgDebugCheckTypes #94621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94577
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 6.0.x
  • [mono] catch the case of updated methods in mono_debug_lookup_source_location #94540
    area-EnC-mono
  • Sve: Early versions of Intrinsics/Arm/Sve and hwintrinsiclistarm64sve #94606
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable IL strip for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasi][wasm] Implement initial support for WasmImportLinkage to the AppBuilders #94615
    area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Very helpful ML-based suggestion :) #70775
  • SourceGenerator not generating the latest code #70771

Closed

  • C# editor auto complete fails, if followed by an operator #70732
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Attempt to simplify SyntacticChangeRangeComputer #70774
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Syntax classification improvement #70772
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Keep the solution pinned (on host and OOP) when making multiple calls between systems. #70765
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix function pointer calling convention go to definition #70773
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix commit behvaior where items use default commit chars as their special filter char #70743
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Collection expressions: IOperation support #70650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [Performance] Reduce allocations in `PENamedTypeSymbol.EnsureTypeParametersAreLoaded` #70766
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Enc: Clean up SemanticEdit #70449
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Break some binding cycles #70759
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Server fails to launch with Microsoft Identity Platform #51996
  • Improve error message when a App Service is started with binaries of the wrong runtime identifier #51995
  • In Blazor Web App, getting console message about class added to Servi #51994
  • aspnetcore-browser-refresh seems to be checking the </body> tag for replacement, which is causing my problem #51993
  • http.sys: Allow configuring extended authentication flags (HTTP_AUTH_EX_FLAG) as options #51990

Closed

  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot #51977
  • Published size improvement: todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #51843
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #51991
  • AddOpenIdConnect is not called in ASP.NET 7 + Angular SPA project. #51972
  • Configure BearerTokenOptions when use AddIdentityApiEndpoints API #51047
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #51988

PullRequests

Updated

  • 47569 - Using FrozenDictionary in HttpMethodDictionaryPolicyJumpTable #51803
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • http.sys: Allow configuring HTTP_AUTH_EX_FLAGs as options #51833
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Relative routes don't work, but absolute ones do. #18695
  • Changing HeightRequest do not trigger SizeChanged on Android. #18694
  • Unable to build chain to self-signed root for signer .NET MAUI 7.0 #18693
  • MAUI Android build crashes when app is reopened from background. It throws the exception: 'Window was already created.' #18692

Closed

  • Impossible to run any UnitTest on MAUI #17914
  • iPad FlyoutPage Master width is half the screen #18485

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump cake.tool from 2.3.0 to 3.2.0 #18691
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the androidx group with 16 updates #18690
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18689
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #18588
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
